scripts.install-crontab: crontab -l 2> /dev/null | grep -q '# ssid-to-slack-status' && echo 'Already installed in crontab' || ((crontab -l 2>/dev/null; echo "*/5 * * * * $(which node) $(pwd)/index.js >/dev/null 2>&1 # ssid-to-slack-status") | crontab - && echo 'Crontab installed')
scripts.uninstall-crontab: crontab -l 2>/dev/null | grep -v '# ssid-to-slack-status' | crontab - && echo 'Uninstalled from crontab'
